responses: Hi there, what questions can I answer for you today?

patterns: what types of clothes do you work on?
what clothes do you have for sale?
responses: we mainly work on suits and formal fashion

patterns: how much does an average suit cost?
what is the price of your suit?
responses: our two-piece suit cost on average $75, though this will depend on its material

patterns: what time do you usually open?
responses: we are open from 8am to 10pm every day
